root: ^Strange, the door was unlocked and some of the lights are on.
^I thought you said your house was going to be empty,
^and you just needed my help getting back!
^I thought we were getting back to an empty home as well.
^if you know whose place you're in,
^well you're about to learn a lesson about trespassing!
^We were waiting for you to get back from gods know where,
^you do not need to threaten us.
^Galedric and Xzciar enter the room, having broken into your house some time ago to wait for them.
^Are you two here to hurt us?
^Why are you here, and who is she?
^And I had not heard a word from you.
^I did not want to take a life while unsure if those I fight for are honorable.
^And I objected to the attack in the first place.
^I mourn my comrade's loss of magic,
^but I didn't believe House Ivy was to blame,
^and yet this role was forced upon me.
^The constables want to tear our office down one brick at a time after what you just did in House Ivy,
^so for the time being, I decided it best for us to stay here and help expose the true villains.
^They are far too busy sorting out madness at House Ivy.
^As long as you don't stir up as much trouble as my house is,
^I see that you've got business to take care of,
^But I don't know anything about magic disappearing or the houses fighting!
^Aether, if I've learned anything from the recent events,
^trying to be neutral and separate from all the houses means you're going to draw even more attention.
^And this involves House Belladonna just as much as any other.
^but you have to promise to come to my concerts,
^I'll bring every house if that's what it'll take.
^Then what are we to do now?
^Were you able to discover anything at House Ivy?
^the attack interrupted all of my plans,
^and I barely got a word in with Levalon Philel before they attacked me.
^You got into a scrap with Philel?
^Count yourself lucky that you made it out of there in one piece,
^I wouldn't do that for any price.
^When Philel comes to train with the soldiers, most claim sudden illness.
^The others take a visit to the medic and know better than to fight him again.
^I'd rather not go for a second round myself.
^and it's standing right here before us...
^Quit talking in riddles and spit it out.
^and we're not at each other's throats.
^I think I'm beginning to see what you're saying...
^The initial council meeting fell apart because nobody bothered to trust each other or properly talk it out.
^They were too busy throwing blame left and right.
^What we need to do is organize a proper gathering where they don't spend all the time accusing the other houses of treason.
^The Houses are far too busy looking for someone to blame.
^House Ivy is taking the blame for something they had no hand in, and the first step towards stabilizing this situation is resolving that.
^All the animosity has to stop, so we can start working towards a solution.
^I can entreat House Spider Lily to bring up talks of a council again.
^They are more than willing to relieve themselves of this.
^Aether, I know it might be tough, but I'm going to need you to -
^If I can't convince Lady Klash, I know she'll listen if I offer free concert tickets.
^That's true. For better or for worse.
^Then who should we turn to for House Cherry Blossom?
^They're just as vital to the meeting as any other house.
^Don't worry yourself over that, I think I can get that covered.
^Now could all of you please find you way back home?
^I need some time to recover, and a crowd isn't going to help.
^we'll be sure to fulfill our roles while you rest.
^I hope you closed the door behind you.
^And here I was thinking that you were not at the top of your game.
^You walked into the home of a private detective.
^If I don't know when somebody has snuck into my house, I'm not long for the job.
^How much of that did you hear?
^I only got in at the latter end.
^Something about House Holly agreeing to everything? I'm curious where this is going.
^and I need your help with bringing Cherry Blossom on board.
^I'm not sure how I feel about this...
^Listen, the last council meeting crashed and burned because they were too busy throwing blame around and not trying to address the problem.
^House Ivy is innocent, I've seen it with my own eyes.
^We've got to focus if we want to make it through.
^I can try to bring House Cherry Blossom,
^but I can't say they'll be expecting a peaceful talk.
^If that's the most you can offer, that will have to do.
^I'll send out an update once I've gotten enough rest, but expect in a few days time.
^Now I must tend to my duties.
